Translations.Text: Ni don them scripture fully detal knowledge guidance mercy popol kred

Ili waiting all (prophecies) est fulfilled Tag such fulfillment ven pas those disregarded gxi en des preter dir messengers our Lord brought truth. Tie any intercessors est al intercede our behalf? Would vi send us tial ke ni sxangx our behavior bon works than ki ni did Ili perd their anim their own innovations kauxz their doom

Your Lord est 1 DI kre heavens ter 6 tag tiam assumed all auxtoritat. Nokt overtakes tag gxi pursues gxi persistently sun lun stel committed dejxor His ordon! Absolutely Li controls all creation all ordon. Exalted est DI Lord univers
Vi worship your Lord publicly privately; Li ne am transgressors
Ne corrupt ter gxi set rekt worship Him reverence esper! Surely di mercy est attainable per des righteous
Li est 1 who send vent bon omen mercy el His man! Once ili gather heavy nub ni sxofor them dead land send down akv therefrom produkt gxi all kinds da frukt! Ni tiel resurrect dead ke vi pren heed
